title: Robin Hood

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Choose a player to steal an ability from. They will be roleblocked all of the next turn, even if dead. Also, choose a player to give that ability to. Next turn, including the immediately following day, they will have access to perform the ability of the player stolen from in addition to their current ability.

desc:
Post 4664
*I take from the rich and give to the bow. also, bow and arrow*
